#labels Featured
== Introduction ==

OSGi JMX Management Model Implementation. 

== Details ==

Specification reference: [http://www.osgi.org/Download/File?url=/download/r4v42/r4.enterprise.pdf OSGi Service Platform Enterprise Specification 4.2 - 124 JMX Management Model Specification].

API JavaDoc reference: [http://www.osgi.org/javadoc/r4v42/org/osgi/jmx/package-summary.html Here].
 

Current version: *1.0.1* (20100426)

Bundle download: [http://osgilab.googlecode.com/files/jmx-1.0.1.jar jmx-1.0.1.jar]

Sources download: [http://osgilab.googlecode.com/files/jmx-1.0.1-sources.jar jmx-1.0.1-sources.jar]  

Javadoc download: [http://osgilab.googlecode.com/files/jmx-1.0.1-javadoc.jar jmx-1.0.1-javadoc.jar]  

Sources browse: [http://code.google.com/p/osgilab/source/browse/tags/jmx-1.0.1 Here] 

Maven Artifact:
{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.osgilab.bundles</groupId>
    <artifactId>jmx</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.1</version>
</dependency>
}}}

== Changes == 
*1.0.1*
  * fix NoClassDefFoundException for Compendium service
  * fix NPEs

*1.0.0*
Implemented functionality:
  * org.osgi.jmx.framework.BundleStateMBean
  * org.osgi.jmx.framework.FrameworkMBean
  * org.osgi.jmx.framework.PackageStateMBean
  * org.osgi.jmx.framework.ServiceStateMBean
  * org.osgi.jmx.service.cm.ConfigurationAdminMBean
  * org.osgi.jmx.service.permissionadmin.PermissionAdminMBean
  * org.osgi.jmx.service.provisioning.ProvisioningServiceMBean
  * org.osgi.jmx.service.useradmin.UserAdminMBean
Optional implemented functionality:
  * [http://osgilab.googlecode.com/svn/tags/jmx-1.0.0/javadoc/org/osgilab/bundles/jmx/service/monitor/MonitorAdminMBean.html org.osgilab.bundles.jmx.service.monitor.MonitorAdminMBean] - MonitorAdmin JMX bean

Logging: OSGi LogService if available, otherwise - java.util.logging

== Source Build Tips ==
The project depends on OSGi Enterprise API jar that is not uploaded to Central Maven repository. You have to add this artifact manually to your local Maven repository to build sources:
  # download jar file from [http://www.osgi.org/download/r4v42/osgi.enterprise.jar here]
  # call *mvn install:install-file -Dfile=osgi.enterprise.jar -DgroupId=org.osgi -DartifactId=org.osgi.enterprise -Dversion=4.2.0 -Dpackaging=jar -DgeneratePom=true*
